channel.title: Helping in an Emergency on Khaled Allen
channel.description: Recent content in Helping in an Emergency on Khaled Allen

item.title: Helping in an Emergency
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1305" align="alignright" width="300" caption="edans on Flickr"][/caption]

First off, I apologize for the delayed posting. My internet has been out for two days. Hopefully, things will run more smoothly.

On Thursday evening, I was on my way home from work when I had to swerve to avoid a truck pulling into my lane to go around what looked like a stopped car. As I passed, I noticed that it wasn't a stopped car, but rather an overturned car. There had just been some sort of accident. I quickly pulled over and put on my emergency blinkers, figuring I knew some emergency response and could be of help.
